description: Personalize your music and style with these vivid Creative EP-660 noise isolation in-ear earphones. Enjoy incredibly smooth acoustic playback from the unique tilt-pipe acoustic chambers powered by high performance Neodymium drivers that deliver a wide dynamic range with a deep bass response optimized for MP3, iPod, iPad & Tablet devices. Soft, multi-sized silicone earbuds are supplied to let you personalize the fit of the EP-660. Available in a choice of 5 vibrant colours: Pearl White, Cobalt Blue, Ruby Pink, Lime Green and Magna Black, pick one to match that unique style of yours!
title: Creative EP-660 In-Ear Noise Isolating Headphones (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
